meanings: exert oneself as hard as possible
put forth one´s strength to the utmost

meanings.meaning: for the most part at (the) most

examples.korean: Their response to the proposal was, at best, cool. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 제안에 대한 그들의 반응은 기껏 냉담한 정도였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: As a news item it merits a short paragraph at most. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 뉴스 항목으로서 기껏해야 짧은 단락 하나를 할애할 정도밖에 안 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As a news item it merits a short paragraph at most. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I will be able to check my e-mails only sporadically at best. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기껏해야 가끔 메일을 확인하는 정도일 겁니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I will be able to check my e-mails only sporadically at best. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You will only be scolded at most. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기껏해야 너는 야단이나 맞겠지. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
